Cybertrons Moons were Cybernetic... not rock. And as for the TFs being a 
fraction of a G1 transformers size that is fault. On Average TF Transformers 
ranged anywhere from 8 feet to 40- 60 feet tall normaly, with some 
exceptions. The size range of BW transformers ranged from 4 feet- Original 
Rattrap to about 20 feet, Optimus Primal(ultra version) and Megatron(ultra 
T-Rex and TM2 Dragon.) Optimal Optimus was the size of a G1 bot.
